title: Food Rating Prediction
description: This project investigates the relationship between recipe characteristics—particularly calories—and user-generated ratings.

title: San Diego Bus Route Optimizer
description: Built a bus route optimizer to find the fastest paths using Dijkstra's algorithm and visualize with Plotly.

title: N-Gram Language Model
description: This project implements an N-Gram Language Model to generate and predict sequences of text based on learned probability distributions.

title: Loan Application EDA
description: This project explores and analyzes a real-world dataset of approved loan applications from LendingClub.

title: Custom Image Processing and Classification
description: This project implements image processing techniques (negation, grayscale, rotation, chroma key, stickers, edge detection) and includes a custom-built K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) image classifier using Python.

title: Persuasive and Deceptive Climate Visualizations
description: This project examines environmental and climate data, showing how honest or deceptive visualizations can influence perceptions through design choices like filtering, scaling, and annotation.

title: Grocery Store Visualization
description: This project visualizes what kind of products are sold grocery store data using Plotly and Seaborn to analyze inventory and health trends.
